en.banner_brief_mobile: Set monitoring, log, alarm in an integrated operation and maintenance platform.
en.banner_describe: UOS Operator is a comprehensive o&m platform that integrates monitoring, log and alarm. It monitors the operation of UOS platform and maintains platform.
en.feature_four_intro: Provide multi-layer monitoring o&m view, layers of refinement.
en.feature_three_intro: Centralized collection of log, archive, compression, backup.
en.feature_two_intro: The alarm classified summary, to receive alarm information.
en.show_one_introduction: Provides monitoring services from the system layer to the application layer, from hardware to software, covering core services such as computing, networking, and storage.
en.show_three_introduction: Through the linkage of all-round monitoring can be layers of deep into the rapid positioning of the fault point.
en.show_two_introduction: The platform generated log, alarm, monitoring data in-depth analysis and found potential problems.
en.solve_four_intro: Integration of multiple o&m tools, visual o&m, improve user experience
en.solve_four_introduction: UOS Operator integrates multiple operation and maintenance tools to a management panel, you can visualize the o&m, improve o&m efficiency, and o&m experience.
en.solve_one_intro: Comprehensive monitoring, effective monitoring of cluster status
en.solve_one_introduction: UOS is a set of subsystems composed of a set of hardware and software as one of the distributed system, covering a wide range, you can effectively monitor the cluster status.
en.solve_two_intro: Timely and quickly locate the fault information
en.solve_two_introduction: UOS system is complex, when the system fails, timely and quickly locate the fault information, can minimize the loss, UOS Operator provide cascading alarm, can quickly locate the fault information.
en.solve_three_introduction: Cloud platform is the cornerstone of building IT, its stability and reliability is critical, UOS designed cloud platform reliability verification, from the cloud platform for multiple dimensions to be reliable.
en.title: UnitedStack - UOS Operator

zh.banner_brief_mobile: 集监控，日志，告警于一体的综合性运维平台。
zh.banner_describe: UOS Operator 是集监控，日志，告警于一体的综合性运维平台，时刻全方位监控 UOS 平台的运行情况，及时获悉事件通知，对数据进行深入分析，及时发现问题，维护平台稳定。
zh.feature_four_intro: 提供多层监控运维视图，层层细化，方便快速定位异常。
zh.feature_one_intro: 提供全方位监控，快速发现平台故障立即修复及避免故障。
zh.feature_three_intro: 集中收集日志，归档，压缩，备份，强大的分析和报表功能。
zh.feature_two_intro: 对告警进行分类汇总，接收及时有效的告警信息。
zh.show_one_introduction: 提供从系统层到应用层，从硬件到软件，涵盖计算，网络，存储等核心服务的监控服务。
zh.show_three_introduction: 通过联动性全方位的监控可以层层升深入快速定位故障点。
zh.show_two_introduction: 对平台产生的日志，告警，监控数据进行深入分析，发现潜在问题。
zh.solve_four_intro: 整合多个运维工具，进行可视化运维，提高用户体验
zh.solve_four_introduction: UOS Operator 整合多个运维工具到一个管理面板，设计了从高层到低层的多个维度的集群状态信息展示面板，可以进行可视化运维，提高运维效率，以及运维体验。
zh.solve_one_intro: 全面监控，有效监控集群状态
zh.solve_one_introduction: UOS 是由多套子系统组成的一套集硬件和软件为一体的分布式系统，涵盖范围深且广，对监控带来很大挑战，UOS Operator 提供云平台由硬件到软件，从底层到上层，全方位监控，可以有效监控集群状态。
zh.solve_two_intro: 及时快速定位故障信息
zh.solve_two_introduction: UOS 系统复杂，当系统出现故障时，及时快速定位故障信息，可以最大程度的减少损失，UOS Operator 涵盖丰富的报警，并且提供级联报警，从上层到下层，可及时快速定位故障信息。
zh.solve_three_intro: 可靠性验证以及故障演练
zh.solve_three_introduction: 云平台是构建IT的基石，其稳定性以及可靠性至关重要，UOS 设计了云平台可靠性验证以及故障演练方案和系统，从云平台的多个维度进行可靠。
zh.title: UnitedStack - UOS Operator
